title: Australian diary. No. 082
creator_credit: Australian National Film Board and Jack S. Allan
brief_description: The following items are featured in this interesting cinemagazine: pipe bands are a traditional part of Scottish life and culture; the manufacture of chisels in Australian factories call for precision and ingenuity; the irrigation of dry areas is of national importance in Australia.
